2091030.name: Timepunk
2091030.description:
Timepunk is a retrofuturistic bullet-hell roguelike where you play as a rogue time traveler, fighting through hundreds of historical enemies. Use weapons from different eras, unlock time-manipulating skills, and create unique builds to survive. Every run is a new path through different historical periods—shoot, loot, and defy physics until you reach the end of time!

Blast your way through various timelines to seek revenge against the mysterious Society of Time! The journey won’t be easy as each timeline brings different challenges like robots, wholly mammoths, and unpredictable outcomes like Nazi Zombies riding Mecha-Dinosaurs. Will you find your revenge against the society of time in this pixelated bullet hell designed for the most skillful of players.

Master of space and time

As a time traveler defy physics with unique different powers, bring weapons from each time period and build your unique build based on the mutations that occur from jumping through time.

Explore different timelines

You're a rogue time traveler from the future that was banished from time and thrown into the dinosaur era. Travel through unpredictable time periods, facing relentless waves of enemies in a dynamically generated roguelike experience. Make decisions that will alter the course of history – be prepared to face the consequences. Each jump through time brings new challenges, ensuring no two playthroughs are ever the same.

Co-op gameplay

Time travel is always better with friends! Team up with up to four players and dive into the chaos together. Arm yourselves, coordinate strategies, and unleash destruction as you navigate the treacherous landscapes of different eras.

Survive the Bullet Hell

Brace yourself for an onslaught of bullets and intense dodging. Timepunk is not for the faint-hearted – it's a bullet hell extravaganza where skill and quick reflexes are your greatest allies.

Time Traveling Shenanigans

The game is full of references to different pop culture and cult classics about time traveling, science and sci-fi. Encounter weapons and skills inspired by different scientists. Save and play as other time travelers. And face unique enemies like reptilian scientists, zombie nazis or space vikings, adding a thrilling layer of unpredictability.

Reach the end of time

Your ultimate goal is to reach your original timeline in the future and take down the nefarious Society of Time. Confront a variety of powerful adversaries and overcome the obstacles they throw your way. The fate of the entire time-space continuum rests in your hands.

Gear up, team up, and embark on a time-traveling adventure like never before in Timepunk – where the past, present, and future collide in a relentless barrage of bullets, physics and excitement! Are you ready to mess with the timeline?
2091030.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
